timeline.title: Fact Finder
timeline.description: The “Fact Finder” provides Total Fulfilment with an overview of your fulfilment requirements and allows us to produce a bespoke quote. Questions are related to your inventory, expected volumes of sales and storage and anything that may be unique to your business.

timeline.title: Quote
timeline.description: Within 24 hours of receiving the completed “Fact Finder”, Total Fulfilment will provide you with a bespoke quote for the required fulfilment services.

timeline.title: Terms and Conditions
timeline.description: Following acceptance of the quote, terms and conditions will be agreed and payment services activated.

timeline.title: Creation of TF Hub
timeline.description: You will now be given access to your TF Hub. A demonstration will be provided by Total Fulfilment and you will have the chance to explore all the ecommerce fulfilment features before going live.
